body_html:
I think torch.argmax / torch.argmin would be good to have in Python. Users have been requesting the feature: #5616.

It would also be good to have torch.argmax not require a dim argument, but I don't know how much harder that is to implement.
body_text:
I think torch.argmax / torch.argmin would be good to have in Python. Users have been requesting the feature: #5616.
It would also be good to have torch.argmax not require a dim argument, but I don't know how much harder that is to implement.
body:
I think torch.argmax / torch.argmin would be good to have in Python. Users have been requesting the feature: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5616.

It would also be good to have torch.argmax not require a dim argument, but I don't know how much harder that is to implement.
